oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several fragments, stuck together, torn and mutilated: The left side is a piece of another fragment, taken from the bottom part of a bifolium and contains the last word of the right side and a page keeper. On the right side another fragment is glued to the text beneath it, which is perhaps an Arabic letter, torn and worn out. All of these are glued to another fragment, taken from a printed text in Arabic (invisible in the image).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Several fragments glued together
